dialogue.speaker: Mom
dialogue.text: Wake up! You're going to be late!

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: Mmm... five more minutes...

dialogue.speaker: Mom
dialogue.text: You said you wanted to visit that new onsen today, didn't you?

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (Oh right... the onsen everyone's been talking about.)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: I drag myself out of bed and get ready for the day.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (Here it is... the Onsen facility everyone's been talking about.)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: I push open the door and step inside.

dialogue.speaker: Front Desk
dialogue.text: Welcome! Please enjoy your stay.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (Something about that smile feels... off. But I'm probably just tired.)

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (The changing room is spotless. But... why are all the mirrors covered?)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: I change into the yukata and push open the door to the hot spring.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (The steam is thick... I can barely see anything.)

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (That familiar feeling again...)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: I enter the hot spring area once more.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (Let me take a look around...)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The other guests look perfectly normal. The clock on the wall ticks forward as expected.

dialogue.speaker: Guest A
dialogue.text: Such nice weather today.

dialogue.speaker: Guest B
dialogue.text: Yes, it's been lovely.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (Nothing seems out of place...)

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (Wait... under the water...)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: I see something I shouldn't have.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: That's... a fin?!

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (No way... this is an onsen, not the ocean...)

dialogue.speaker: Guest A
dialogue.text: What are you looking at?

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: N-nothing...

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: [SANITY -15]

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (How long have I been in here...?)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: My head starts to feel light. The water seems hotter than before.

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: You've been soaking for a while. Would you like to move to the cold spring?

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (That smile... something feels off.)

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: [SANITY -10]

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: How much time has passed...?

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: My vision blurs. Sounds stretch and warp around me.

dialogue.speaker: Guests
dialogue.text: Join us... join us...

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (No... something's wrong...)

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: It seems you require special care.

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: [SANITY -20]

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: I'd like to go to the cold spring.

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: Of course. It's right this way.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The cold water snaps my mind awake.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (That's better...)

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: [SANITY +15]

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (Calm down... I need to calm down...)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: I rush into the cold spring, submerging myself completely.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: Hah... hah...

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: Are you all right? You seem distressed.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: I-I'm fine. I just needed to cool off.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The cold sharpens my thoughts. What I saw earlier... was it a hallucination?

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: [SANITY +25]

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: I think it's time to leave.

dialogue.speaker: Front Desk
dialogue.text: Thank you for visiting! We hope you had a pleasant experience.

dialogue.speaker: Front Desk
dialogue.text: We look forward to seeing you again.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (I'm finally out...)

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (I have to leave... now!)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: I change back into my clothes and rush out the door.

dialogue.speaker: Front Desk
dialogue.text: Take care... you'll be back.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (What did they mean by that...?)

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: Ah!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: I accidentally cut my feet on the stones by the pool.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: Damn... I'm bleeding...

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Blood drips into the water. Instantly, every guest turns to look at me.

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: ...The scent of blood.

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: Please come with me. We need to... take care of this.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: This smells delicious, and I am so hungry...

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: I lose control and start biting at a nearby guest.

dialogue.speaker: Other Guests
dialogue.emotion: All movement stops. Every head turns toward me.

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: An unstable guest.

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: Initiating containment procedure.

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: Hello. Do you require assistance?

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: No, thank you. I can manage on my—

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: We believe you would benefit from our special service.

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: Please follow me.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (Why... can't I move my body?)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: For a brief moment, the steam parts.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: That is not human. A massive fin cuts through the water.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (This can't be... this isn't an onsen... this is—)

dialogue.speaker: Guest A
dialogue.text: You saw it.

dialogue.speaker: Guest B
dialogue.text: That's unfortunate.

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: [SANITY -15] [ANOMALY DISCOVERED]
